entry.div:
For making gray
wood
Take
alum
with
river water
, make them boil together, then take
river water
with
bran
, submerge the
bran
and beat it together. Take
iron filings
&
sulfur
&
verdigris
and
grindings
, and make it all boil together, and pound
maplewood
which will have been soaked in
alum water
and
well water
, & put it to boil together.
All of this will be done better in a hollow
grais
.
